articles.title: G20 foreign ministers in South Africa but US snubs meeting - BBC.com
articles.description: President Ramaphosa urges multilateralism as US secretary of state boycotts the meeting of foreign ministers.
articles.content:
South Africa's President Cyril Ramaphosa has told G20 foreign ministers that a commitment to multilateralism and international law is vital to solving global crises. 
His comments follow growing con… [+2340 chars]
